original_title: The Old Man in the Rocking Chair
overview: A short horror film based on the Italian Giallo films of the 70's & 80's. A young house-keeper of a elderly man in a rocking chair becomes involved in a murderous rampage in an isolated farm house. She will soon reveal the true secret of what is really happening. Dedicated and inspired by the films of: Dario Argento, Lucio Fulci, and Mario Bava.
title: The Old Man in the Rocking Chair
